analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BigbomTokenSale.checkMaxCap (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#639-645):
	External calls:
	- result = contributorMaxCap(contributor,amountInWei) (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#640-641)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- participated (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#641-644)

BigbomToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#289-290) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#54)

BigbomToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#567-572) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#571-572)

BigbomTokenSale.finalizeSale (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#706-715) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.burn(token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#714)

Reentrancy in BigbomTokenSale.buy (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#657-701):
	External calls:
	- mincap = contributorMinCap(recipient) (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#664-666)
	- maxcap = checkMaxCap(recipient,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#666-667)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value.sub(maxcap)) (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#680-684)
	- sendETHToMultiSig(allowValue) (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#685-686)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- raisedWei (/unique_chucks/10/0x6f91e584f4c150951386b133e21aa769c8b7d060.sol#686-687)
